section.title: 小智后台前端
section.screen:
# Download and install nvm: curl -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.40.3/install.sh | bash
# in lieu of restarting the shell \. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh"
# Download and install Node.js: nvm install 22
# Verify the Node.js version: node -v # Should print "v22.16.0". nvm current # Should print "v22.16.0".
# Verify npm version: npm -v # Should print "10.9.2".

[root@development ~]# curl -s -o- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nvm-sh/nvm/v0.40.3/install.sh | bash
export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" # This loads nvm [ -s "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion" ] && \. "$NVM_DIR/bash_completion"
[root@development ~]# \. "$HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh" [root@development ~]# nvm install 22
